TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorConvertedBitmapExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

Docs.summary: Implements a markup extension that enables <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"> creation. A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"> does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is a markup extension implementation. Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. This extension supports the [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](../Topic/ColorConvertedBitmap%20Markup%20Extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](../Topic/ColorConvertedBitmap%20Markup%20Extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ColorConvertedBitmapExtension"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is not used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object image) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that is parsed to determine three [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]: image source, source color context, and destination color context.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ColorConvertedBitmapExtension"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that can provide services for the markup extension. This service is expected to provide results for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied. For <see cref="T:System.Windows.ColorConvertedBitmapExtension">, this is the completed <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"> based on the values passed to the constructor.
